introduction: From understanding the basics of types and interfaces to mastering advanced concepts like generics and decorators, this quiz will help you write safer, more reliable code. Perfect for both beginners and seasoned developers aiming to level up their TypeScript skills.

levels.intro: Start here to learn the essentials of TypeScript, focusing on basic types, interfaces, and how TypeScript improves JavaScript.

topics.title: Basic Types
topics.description: Learn how to define and use different data types.

topics.title: Interfaces
topics.description: Define the shape of objects with interfaces.

topics.title: Type Inference
topics.description: Let TypeScript infer types for you.

topics.title: Enums
topics.description: Use enums to define named constants.

levels.intro: Enhance your skills by learning about more powerful TypeScript features like generics and type manipulation.

topics.title: Decorators
topics.description: Add meta-programming features to your classes.

levels.intro: Master TypeScript’s advanced features to handle complex projects and ensure robust type safety.

topics.title: Advanced Types
topics.description: Dive deeper into utility types and mapped types.

topics.title: Type Guards
topics.description: Refine types using control flow analysis.

topics.title: TypeScript with React
topics.description: Use TypeScript effectively in React projects.
